Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela. A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe. A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon. Americas third political party, the New Founding Fathers of America, comes to power and conducts an experiment: no laws for 12 hours on Staten Island. No one has to stay on the island, but $5,000 is given to anyone who does. Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York Citys yearly Met Gala. When the islands dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event. A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanitys survival. Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable. menu items </!--> Task Handler Open Background Service Activity Counter Fragment צור התחל ביטול This is AsyncTask Activity This is Handler Activity START INTENT SERVICE START SERVICE The Progress Worker progress Required Network Required Charging Required Battery Not Low Open WorkerManager Activity ENQUEUE WORK CANCEL WORK
